Interface Drawer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractControllerTool, AbstractDrawer, AbstractStateTool, AbstractTransitionTool, AccTool, AltAutomatonDrawer, AltConnectorTool, AltStateTool, AltTransitionTool, AutomatonCanvas.MyIdleDrawer, AutomatonDrawer, AutomatonTool, ColoringTool, DeleteTool, EditableDrawer, FocusStateTool, FormulaDrawer, FSADrawer, FSAStateTool, FSATransitionTool, GameDrawer, GamePlayer0StateTool, GamePlayer1StateTool, GameTransitionTool, GridlinesDrawer, IdleDrawer, MSStateInfoDrawer, NextStageTool, NextStepTool, PitermanStateInfoDrawer, SafraStateInfoDrawer, ScheweStateInfoDrawer, SelectTool, StartPlayTool, StateInfoDrawer, StopPlayTool, TestTool, TextTree, TwoWayAltAutomatonDrawer, TwoWayAltTransitionTool
public interface Drawer

A Drawer provides an interface for drawing something with a specified Graphics2D object.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
